oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mildred Morgan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Morgan, Mildred; pilots; aviation; women; portraits;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An autographed portrait of Mildred Morgan. Handwritten note on front reads, "To My Pal, Phoebe -- The Moonlight-Saving-Time Girl. -- From -- Mildred Mogan." Note on back reads, "Mildred Morgan - Winner Second Place - 1930 Women's Pacific Air Derby - Long Beach, Cal. to Chicago."
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript Collection processed by Laura Cunningham
